snippet: After the Buranovskiye Babushki became a hit at the Eurovision song contest and on the Internet, improvements came to the village of Buranovo.
abstract: Buranovo Journal; after the Buranovskiye Babushki, or Grandmothers of Buranovo, became a hit at the Eurovision song contest and on the Internet, improvements came to the village of Buranovo; in appreciation of the group’s near victory, the local government is building a water pipeline, installing streetlights and high-speed Internet for the village’s sole school and laying new gravel on the main roads.
lead_paragraph: After the Buranovskiye Babushki became a hit at the Eurovision song contest and on the Internet, improvements came to the village of Buranovo.

headline.seo: Grandmothers of Buranovo Give Russian Village New Life
headline.main: The Grandmothers Sang ‘Come On and Dance!’ and a Village Got New Life
headline.print_headline: The Grandmothers Sang ‘Come On and Dance!’ And a Village Got New Life
